sn35.76:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma radho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.76:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.76:1.4: “Yam kho, radha, aniccam tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.76:1.5: Kinca, radha, aniccam tatra te chando pahatabbo?
sn35.76:1.8: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam. Tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.76:1.11: mano anicco. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.76:1.15: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.76:1.16: Yam kho, radha, aniccam tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
